column4: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook and be aware that installation to  a newly released mac may not be possible yet.
thanks.  been there.  fyi, SATA AHCI PCI id 10de:0d85.  it matches macbookpro7,1.
thanks, been there too.  i suspect i shall have to replace the installer kernel.  i'm a developer, i guess i'm in the wrong place.  ;-}
